item.title: Who Am I?
item.description: Iâ€™m a 3rd year student at Boston College, studying computer science <> math and a few classes in neuroscience. I’m currently exploring and looking for a company to get involved in and spend all my time on ðŸ¦¤. I have a lot of fun using my hands to build stuff. item.title: Current Obsession
item.description: The Poppy War by R.F. Kuang. Adding updates on my reading journey here. (Please dm me on twitter if you’ve read this!!)
